overview: The Spooky Twig is a crafting material used solely for crafting Spooky Wings. It has a chance to be dropped by Mourning Wood during the Pumpkin Moon event, with an increasing drop rate as waves progress.
tips: Selling the Spooky Wings instead of the individual components will be more profitable. The wings sell for 8 Gold Coins, whereas the components sell for a collective 2 Gold Coins 90 Silver Coins.
title: Spooky Twig
